title: Daddy's Boy
description: Forever was what Denny Garcia planned on after meeting Rachel Owen, but forever was not what others had in mind for the young couple.Denny walked away from a four months pregnant Rachel leaving both of them heartbroken and the reason why a secret to everyone including Rachel.After a Denver drug boss comes looking for Rachel’s father, Rachel must turn to Denny for help. Denny thought his days of risking everything were buried with his father, but now Rachel’s back and the risk of losing it all again is a risk he has to take.The Denver underground is calling, and this time the stakes are even higher.Denny, Jonah, Olivia, Mason, Shark and Nick are back for the second story in the Risk series.
author: Samantha Grady
